channel.title: Forwarding Ports... Linksys Is a pain
channel.description: Hi everyone, I have a linksys router and im trying to forward the ports so I can let people join my private server. The problem is that I can't find a moparscape rs private server portforward tutorial on a Linksys BEFSR41 v3. I can show pictures of what the gaming page looks like.. It's annoying trying to figure this out. Please contact me on msn if possible. smugglinpixiedust66@hotmail.com ... Also sometimes get this error... "Server: Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?"

item.title: Forwarding Ports... Linksys Is a pain
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

Well… I can help you. Run the same router.

Also if it says unable to startup listener port in use…
don’t hit “start server” on the moparscape client. post back for me to help you.

Read full topic
item.source: Forwarding Ports... Linksys Is a pain

item.title: Forwarding Ports... Linksys Is a pain

www.portforward.com

Yay.

item.title: Forwarding Ports... Linksys Is a pain
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Linksys routers are the easiest and you get that error message cuz…USE COMMON SENSE MAN!! the port must already be forwarded!!!

Read full topic
